modName: Lawrens RNG Guards HD Texture Replacer
descriptionHtml:
................
Description
................

Retexture of \"Lawrens RNG Guards\" Mod. 
With this Mod \"Lawrens RNG Guards\" use the HD Textures from CaBaL120\'s brilliant 
\"aMidianBorn Iron and Banded Armor\" Mod. I adjusted the textures and now the Markarth and Riften guards armor look like they should.

...................
Requirements
...................

Of course, Lawrens RNG Guards Mod by deathbat55.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9323]Lawrens RNG Guards[/url]


........
Install
........

Just drop the \"data-folder\" inside your Skyrim folder or use the mod manager.



..........
Credits
..........

I thank [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/571605]CaBaL120[/url] that he let me use his textures. Check out his brilliant [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24909]Retextures[/url].

And also thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/856724]deathbat55[/url] for his awesome [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9323]Mod[/url].




Enjoy and sorry for bad english.

faller7763
author: faller7763

files.name: Lawrens RNG Guards HD Texture Replacer_v1-0
